Class ServerEditor

    • Activity

  • public class ServerEditor
extends Activity

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ToggleButton mConnectButton
      ToggleButton letting the user connect to or disconnect from the ServerConnection.
      private java.lang.Boolean mEditsLocked
      Whether editing is locked (true) or enabled (false).
      private EditText mIPText
      EditText view where the user can input the ServerConnection IP.
      private TextView mLastUsedText
      TextView displaying the time and date when the ServerConnection was last connected to.
      private EditText mNameText
      EditText view where the user can input the ServerConnection name.
      private EditText mPathText
      EditText view where the user can input the ServerConnection path, e.g.
      private EditText mPortText
      EditText view where the user can input the ServerConnection Port.
      private java.lang.Long mRowId
      The row id in the local SQLite database of the currently displayed ServerConnection, or -1 if a new ServerConnection is created.
      private Button mSaveEditButton
      Button letting the user save edits or enable editing of the ServerConnection.
      private BackboneSvc mService
      A reference to the application's background Service, received through the IBinder passed to the ServiceConnection after the Activity has bound to the Service.
      private ServiceConnection mServiceConnection
      Defines the callback for Service binding, passed to bindService().
      private EditText mWorkspaceText
      EditText view where the user can input the ServerConnection workspace name on the geospatial server.
      static java.lang.String TAG
      The error tag for this Activity.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private boolean checkText(java.lang.String[] text)
      Checks the return String array from getText() if they are input correctly, and otherwise displays alert dialogs to notify the user.
      void enableConnectButton(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables the connect button according to the parameter.
      void enableEdits(boolean enable)
      Method for enabling or disabling use of the text fields.
      private void fetchLayoutObjects()
      Method for finding the layout objects in the resources and storing their references as instance variables.
      long getRowId()
      Get method for the RowId of the ServerConnection that is currently viewed by this ServerEditor.
      private java.lang.String[] getText()
      Get method for the text written in the EditText boxes by the user.
      private void noNetwork()
      Alerts the user that a network connection is missing and send the user to the system's Wireless Settings.
      protected void onBound()
      Continuation of the create/resume process, called from onServiceConnected after having bound to the Service.
      void onClickConnect(View view)
      Listener method that sets or clears the active server in the BackboneSvc and makes a getCapabilities request to the active ServerConnection on "connecting".
      void onClickSaveEdit(View view)
      Listener method which is called when the Save/Edit button is clicked, it will save the input text to a new ServerConnection or update an existing one in the local SQLite database.

      protected void onPause() 
      protected void onResume() 
      protected void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle outState) 
      void populateFields()
      Method that displays the information on the selected connection in the text fields and sets the fields uneditable.
      private void saveState()
      Method called in onPause() or onSaveInstanceState(Bundle) that stores the currently entered information in a variable on the BackboneSvc so that it will not be lost in case of a sudden interruption.
      void setConnectButtonState(int state)
      Method that changes the state of the connect button.

    • Field Detail

      • TAG

        public static final java.lang.String TAG
        The error tag for this Activity.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • mService

        private BackboneSvc mService
        A reference to the application's background Service, received through the IBinder passed to the ServiceConnection after the Activity has bound to the Service.

      • mServiceConnection

        private ServiceConnection mServiceConnection
        Defines the callback for Service binding, passed to bindService().

      • mNameText

        private EditText mNameText
        EditText view where the user can input the ServerConnection name.

      • mIPText

        private EditText mIPText
        EditText view where the user can input the ServerConnection IP.

      • mPortText

        private EditText mPortText
        EditText view where the user can input the ServerConnection Port.

      • mPathText

        private EditText mPathText
        EditText view where the user can input the ServerConnection path, e.g. "/geoserver".

      • mWorkspaceText

        private EditText mWorkspaceText
        EditText view where the user can input the ServerConnection workspace name on the geospatial server.

      • mLastUsedText

        private TextView mLastUsedText
        TextView displaying the time and date when the ServerConnection was last connected to.

      • mSaveEditButton

        private Button mSaveEditButton
        Button letting the user save edits or enable editing of the ServerConnection.

      • mConnectButton

        private ToggleButton mConnectButton
        ToggleButton letting the user connect to or disconnect from the ServerConnection.

      • mEditsLocked

        private java.lang.Boolean mEditsLocked
        Whether editing is locked (true) or enabled (false).

      • mRowId

        private java.lang.Long mRowId
        The row id in the local SQLite database of the currently displayed ServerConnection, or -1 if a new ServerConnection is created.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()

      • onBound

        protected void onBound()
        Continuation of the create/resume process, called from onServiceConnected after having bound to the Service.

      • onPause

        protected void onPause()

      • populateFields

        public void populateFields()
        Method that displays the information on the selected connection in the text fields and sets the fields uneditable. The fields will be editable again when the edit button is pressed.

      • onSaveInstanceState

        protected void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle outState)

      • saveState

        private void saveState()
        Method called in onPause() or onSaveInstanceState(Bundle) that stores the currently entered information in a variable on the BackboneSvc so that it will not be lost in case of a sudden interruption.

      • onClickSaveEdit

        public void onClickSaveEdit(View view)
        Listener method which is called when the Save/Edit button is clicked, it will save the input text to a new ServerConnection or update an existing one in the local SQLite database.
        Parameters:
        view - The View object that was clicked.

      • onClickConnect

        public void onClickConnect(View view)
        Listener method that sets or clears the active server in the BackboneSvc and makes a getCapabilities request to the active ServerConnection on "connecting".
        Parameters:
        view - The view that initiated the call.

      • enableEdits

        public void enableEdits(boolean enable)
        Method for enabling or disabling use of the text fields.
        Parameters:
        enable - The state to set the text fields and the button to.

      • enableConnectButton

        public void enableConnectButton(boolean enable)
        Enables or disables the connect button according to the parameter.
        Parameters:
        enable - True to enable the connect button.

      • setConnectButtonState

        public void setConnectButtonState(int state)
        Method that changes the state of the connect button. Pass in 0 for "Disconnected", 1 for "Connected" and 2 for "Connecting".
        Parameters:
        state - The state to set the button to.

      • fetchLayoutObjects

        private void fetchLayoutObjects()
        Method for finding the layout objects in the resources and storing their references as instance variables.

      • getText

        private java.lang.String[] getText()
        Get method for the text written in the EditText boxes by the user.
        Returns:
        A three field String array with ServerConnection name, ip, port, path, workspace and date of last use.

      • checkText

        private boolean checkText(java.lang.String[] text)
        Checks the return String array from getText() if they are input correctly, and otherwise displays alert dialogs to notify the user.
        Parameters:
        text - String array returned from the local getText() method.
        Returns:
        True if the inputs are valid.
        See Also:
        The method whose return should be given as input.

      • getRowId

        public long getRowId()
        Get method for the RowId of the ServerConnection that is currently viewed by this ServerEditor.
        Returns:
        The row ID of the ServerConnection being edited.

      • noNetwork

        private void noNetwork()
        Alerts the user that a network connection is missing and send the user to the system's Wireless Settings.
